entities.name: INTELLIGENT CLOUD
entities.description: The Intelligent Cloud segment consists of public, private, and hybrid server products and cloud services that power modern business and developers. It includes Azure, SQL Server, Windows Server, Visual Studio, System Center, related Client Access Licenses (CALs), and GitHub.

entities.name: ENTERPRISE SERVICES
entities.description: Enterprise Services include Premier Support Services and Microsoft Consulting Services.

entities.name: MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING
entities.description: The More Personal Computing segment consists of products and services focused on customer-centric experiences with technology. It includes Windows, Windows Commercial, Windows Internet of Things, MSN advertising, Devices (including Surface and PC accessories), and Gaming (including Xbox hardware and content, Xbox Game Pass, video games, third-party royalties, cloud services, and advertising).

entities.name: AZURE
entities.description: Azure is a cloud computing service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: SQL SERVER
entities.description: SQL Server is a relational database management system included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: WINDOWS SERVER
entities.description: Windows Server is an operating system for servers included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: VISUAL STUDIO
entities.description: Visual Studio is an integrated development environment (IDE) included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: SYSTEM CENTER
entities.description: System Center is a suite of system management products included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: GITHUB
entities.description: GitHub is a platform for version control and collaboration included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: PREMIER SUPPORT SERVICES
entities.description: Premier Support Services is part of Enterprise Services included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: MICROSOFT CONSULTING SERVICES
entities.description: Microsoft Consulting Services is part of Enterprise Services included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.

entities.name: WINDOWS
entities.description: Windows is an operating system included in the More Personal Computing segment, encompassing OEM licensing, non-volume and volume licensing, cloud services, and commercial offerings.

entities.name: WINDOWS COMMERCIAL
entities.description: Windows Commercial includes volume licensing, cloud services, and other commercial offerings of the Windows operating system.

entities.name: WINDOWS INTERNET OF THINGS
entities.description: Windows Internet of Things is a subset of Windows catering to IoT devices, included in the More Personal Computing segment.

entities.name: MSN ADVERTISING
entities.description: MSN Advertising is part of the More Personal Computing segment, encompassing advertising services on MSN.

entities.name: DEVICES
entities.description: Devices is a category within the More Personal Computing segment, including Surface and PC accessories.

entities.name: SURFACE
entities.description: Surface is a line of devices included in the More Personal Computing segment.

entities.name: GAMING
entities.description: Gaming is a category within the More Personal Computing segment, including Xbox hardware, content, services, Game Pass, video games, third-party royalties, cloud services, and advertising.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: Xbox is a gaming platform included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment.

relationships.relationship_description: Enterprise Services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Azure is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
SQL Server is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Windows Server is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Visual Studio is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
System Center is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
GitHub is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Premier Support Services are part of Enterprise Services within the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Microsoft Consulting Services are part of Enterprise Services within the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Windows is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Windows Commercial is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Windows Internet of Things is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
MSN Advertising is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Devices is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Gaming is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Surface is included in the Devices category within the More Personal Computing segment.
Xbox is included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment.
